description: Comprehensive Jenkins job operations with parameter validation

functions.description: Retrieve detailed information about a Jenkins job including parameters and requirements. Use when users need to understand job requirements/available parameters or when you need to look at this data. Defaults to docker-scan job if no job specified.
functions.name: get_job_info

job_name.description: Name of the Jenkins job to get information about (defaults to docker-scan)

functions.description: List all Jenkins jobs supported by this agent with their parameters and descriptions. Use when users ask 'what jobs are available?' or when you need to see all supported Jenkins operations.
functions.name: list_jobs

functions.description: Execute any supported Jenkins job with specified parameters. CRITICAL: Only executes when confirmed=true. Use for job execution ONLY after user confirmation.
functions.name: trigger_job

job_parameters.description: JSON object containing job-specific parameters. Each job has different required and optional parameters.

job_name.description: Name of the Jenkins job to trigger (e.g., 'docker-scan', 'central-release-promotion')

confirmed.description: REQUIRED: Must be 'true' to execute the job. Set to 'true' ONLY after user explicitly confirms job execution. Never set to 'true' without user confirmation. Accepts: 'true', 'false', true, false.
